title: Maven extension plugin should not fill in description from parent pom
body:
### Description

See [discussion elsewhere](https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkusio.github.io/pull/1634#issuecomment-1456509701). @gastaldi and I have agreed that we might also want to make a change in the maven extension plugin. If a project does not fill in a description, leaving the description blank is probably better than filling in `Parent POM for Quarkiverse projects that includes the default release and artifact publishing related configuration`. Occasionally a parent pom might have a relevant description, but in most cases it wouldn't. We have about 10 of these in the registry at the moment. See, for example, 

```
    {
      "name": "Jdbi Quarkus - Runtime",
      "description": "Parent POM for Quarkiverse projects that includes the default release and artifact publishing related\n    ...
    },
```

### Implementation ideas

_No response_
